comments:
eclipse.buildId=I20041214-2000
java.version=1.4.2_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=motif, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -showlocation
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws motif -arch x86 -showlocation -clean

Run the Browser JUnit tests without setting MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME.  At first the
tests fail with the expected "No more handles" error but eventually I get a "No
more callbacks" error followed by a bunch of NPEs:

disposed.

Fixed in HEAD for 3.1.
